title: Emerald Kundan Jhumka Earrings - A Timeless South Indian Treasure
materials: Seed Pearls. Features a radiant Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: These exquisite jhumkas showcase a classic temple design, intricately adorned with Kundan stones. The teardrop emerald centerpiece adds a touch of regal elegance, complemented by cascading seed pearls for a traditional yet sophisticated finish. Fine filigree work enhances the overall beauty.
colors: Accents of silver shimmer from the Kundan setting.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for half-saree functions and family celebrations.
description: Experience the allure of South Indian tradition with these stunning Jhumka earrings. Meticulously crafted by skilled artisans, the vibrant emeralds and delicate pearl drops add a touch of opulence to your ensemble. These are a timeless investment, embodying cultural heritage and exquisite craftsmanship. Excellent gift choice.
